title: Typesettra Ltd. Les Usherwood?
content:
Does anyone have a catalogue of the late Les Usherwood's Typesettra Ltd.   
   
Or know anything of the history?
author: gerald_giampa

comments.content:
The correct spelling is Typsettra.   
   
Try Steve Jackaman. He digitized many of Les' faces for the Red Rooster "Usherwood Collection".   
   
There is a poster titled "Legacy" (designed by Steve?), which has a one-line showing of all his faces.

Thank you both Jim and Nick.   
   
Gerald Giampa

Gerald   
   
Try Mat Warburton of the BC Chapter GDC. He once worked for Usherwood in Toronto.   
   
Jim Rimmer
